resources.string: Not only for water sports enthusiasts! There is a beautiful wild beach with sandy volleyball court running west of the wooden pier.
Five routes adapted to every age and growth. Nearby you can sunbathe, picnic or enjoy water sports.
Baroque church from 1661-1667 with a well-preserved portal and a beatiful bell tower. The church was founded by King Jan Kazimierz.

In a charmingly located place there are ruins of the manor house and farm buildings of the Szaniawski family. The manor house was erected in 1838. Right next to it there are remains of an old steam mill, which was one of the largest and most modern in nineteenth-century Europe.
Pizza baked in a real wood-fired oven.
A varied cuisine based on seasonal products.
Hotel Narvil has a large spa, sports facilities and a conference center. The property is located on the banks of the Narwia River.
Located in a quiet and peaceful area on the southern shore of the Zegrze Reservoir, the hotel has its own beach, pier and marina.
Hotel Marina Diana has its own private beach. It offers bright rooms with free Wi-Fi, as well as water sports equipment.
The fleet available for charter consists of Omega, RS Vision, RS Vareo and catamarans. The rental company also offers rowing boats and kayaks.
The largest windsurfing center on The Zegrze Reservoir. The main area of its activity is teaching windsurfing and running a professional rental.
The rental company offers motorboats, pedal boats and kayaks.
